reviewText: Good to learn what is Bansuri and how to begin with
Great for young kids.  Well made.  Comes with internet content too.  Some parts are not needed like the interviews they do with kids.

the video is fine the audio lacks a little in quality but the information conveyed is priceless. if your not familiar with a thick indian accent it might throw you off a little at first. aside from the chromatic bansuri this is the best tuitiuonal material i have found for the bansuri, the best instrument ever devised!
It was ok, but not great...it was very much based on the Indian flute...it didn't cover the main flute I was interested in..
Uninformative. The DVD is mostly footage of kids talking about how they like to play the drums.
